original_text: And the clean person must splash the water on the unclean person on the third day too. And he must do it on the seventh day. On the seventh day he will make the person clean again. Then the person who had not been clean must wash his clothes. And he must wash himself in water. In the evening, that person will become clean.
korean_text: 그 정결한 자가 셋째 날과 일곱째 날에 그 부정한 자에게 뿌려서 일곱째 날에 그를 정결하게 할 것이며 그는 자기 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이라 저녁이면 정결하리라

sentences.original_text: And the clean person must splash the water on the unclean person
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 깨끗한 사람은 부정한 사람에게 물을 뿌려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And he must do it on the seventh day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 칠 일에도 그렇게 해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: On the seventh day he will make the person clean again
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일에 그는 그 사람을 다시 깨끗하게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then the person who had not been clean must wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 부정했던 사람은 자기 옷을 빨아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And he must wash himself in water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 물로 자신을 씻어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: In the evening, that person will become clean
sentences.korean_translation: 저녁에 그 사람은 깨끗하게 될 것입니다
